QuestData.Title: Soul Led Astray
QuestData.Description:
Uther was a being of justice on your world. I am sure it was quite surprising for you to see his fate here, following a leader who embodies what he stood against in life.
I believe you should witness this memory firsthand. Take it to my soul mirror. View the memories within.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Soul Mirror at the Eonian Archives to view Uther's arrival in Bastion.
